verses.name: 2 Kings 12:19
verses.text: And the rest of the acts of Joash, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.name: 2 Kings 12:20
verses.text: And his servants arose, and made a conspiracy, and slew Joash in the house of Millo, which goeth down to Silla.

verses.name: 2 Kings 12:21
verses.text: For Jozachar the son of Shimeath, and Jehozabad the son of Shomer, his servants, smote him, and he died; and they buried him with his fathers in the city of David: and Amaziah his son reigned in his stead.
